author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO EXPECTED TO SLOWLY WEAKEN AND BECOME POST-TROPICAL NEAR THE END OF THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...IVO EXPECTED TO SLOWLY WEAKEN AND BECOME POST-TROPICAL NEAR THE END OF THE WEEKEND... As of 8:00 PM MST Sat Aug 09 the center of Ivo was located near 21.2, -114.1 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO EXPECTED TO SLOWLY WEAKEN AND BECOME POST-TROPICAL NEAR THE END OF THE WEEKEND... As of 8:00 PM MST Sat Aug 09 the center of Ivo was located near 21.2, -114.1 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
